content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on the identification of fugitive felons, including
definition of a fugitive felon
legal basis for the fugitive felon match
objectives of the fugitive felon match
Office of Inspector General (OIG) responsibilities regarding the match
National Crime Information Center (NCIC) offense codes and descriptions
actions to take when reviewing
Form FFP-3, VA Investigative Summary Form
, to determine fugitive felon status
, and
Veterans Benefits Administration (VBA) responsibilities regarding the match
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 8 - Fugitive Felon Match
